ticket.title: 3.0-style validators silently don't run if application name is plural of model name
ticket.original-body: I had an application called Subscriptions and a model called Subscription. The 3.0-style validators silently did not run. A validator that ran a block ran successfully. So, I guess the validators were not being generated properly. Changing the name of the application repaired the problem.
